Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers followed by SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers followed by SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are immediately repeated in the same case (consecutive repetitions)
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities

Name: Percentage of variants containing SW-AE Assign Reviewers relative to total number of variants
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Average number of SW-AE Assign Reviewers executions per variant that includes it
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that occur after SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that precede any reviewer response activity (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Ratio of SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Reviewer Agreed across the entire log
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in cases that eventually reach SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers occurring in cases that result in SW-EIC Reject versus those resulting in SW-EIC Accept or revision decisions
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are followed within 7 days by a reviewer response (any of SW-Reviewer Agreed/Declined/No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in comparison to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 and Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-AE Assign Reviewers appears more than three times, indicating prolonged reviewer assignment difficulty
Metric: the average of the function base > 3 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that occur after a Reviewer Invitation Reminder, suggesting reassignment due to non-response
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Fraction of SW-AE Assign Reviewers executions that lead directly (within the next activity) to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in variants that include Assign a Different Editor, highlighting editorial intervention
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers per month to identify temporal workload patterns for associate editors
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'", 'aggregation': 'total', 'group_by': 'time:timestamp'}"
